propertyConfig.name: Eden Apartments
propertyConfig.description: Discover tranquility in the heart of the city at Eden Apartments. Our community features lush landscapes, sophisticated architecture, and all the amenities you need for comfortable living.

floorPlans.description: Compact and efficient studio with modern finishes.

floorPlans.name: 2 Bedroom / 2 Bathroom

amenities.description: Dedicated space for yoga, meditation, and wellness classes.

amenities.name: Co-Working Lounge
amenities.description: Modern co-working space with high-speed internet and private booths.

amenities.name: Pet Park
amenities.description: Fully equipped pet park for dogs and cats.

amenities.name: Bike Storage & Repair
amenities.description: Secure bike storage with repair station for convenient commuting.

amenities.name: Community Lounge
amenities.description: Modern social space for events and gatherings.
